Welcome Email 
 
 
 
 
 If you are unable to see the message below, click here to view. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Dear Elzey, 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Important Safety Information 
 
Terms and Conditions of Use 
 
 
Privacy Policy 
 
 
Our Privacy Policy 
 
 
We will not rent or sell your information to anyone. Your mailing address and 
any other personal information you provide voluntarily are kept confidential and 
will be used to send you information about our news. However, if at any time you no longer 
wish to receive communications from us, please go to our website to unsubscribe and we will remove you 
from our communications list.
